anjalin gunathilaka aha aha aadaraniya sina - hatharadenama surayo, susudu ralla walle perali - abhirahasa, sudupata midum galala - edath suraya adath suraya, jiwithaye kanthare, dothin dothayi - suhada pathuma, midum gala kande, jiwanaye miwanaye - thushara, amara pem lathawe, dase mage sathapena - sadahatama oba mage, he kelle he kelle rahasak mama kiyami - hondama welawa, samudurayi ralayi mage, aadara mal gomuwe - sinawayi inawayi, punsanda men lassana honda denethayi dasunayi - hondayi narakayi, alle gangulalle, bandi premaya dedenage - dahakin ekek, wasanthaye me aadare - mal wahi sithala mal wasse - hondata hondayi - hada wiman dorin, pata podak thilakala - kasthuri suwanda, sithin darannata bari, sithala nalawal nonidana - susi, ranmadu rankiri garunda thalawaka, yauwana wasanthe udawi - aawa soya aadare, aadarayen banduna dine - obe nilmini wu dasin - suraya surayamayi, pem sanda paya nawe, piliganna ma hada thiline - sadhana, mi pirunu suwanda mal wane, ira handa wandala - sangitha, irayi mage sandayi mage - pradipe ma wewa, mal supipena wiye, dine lanka shri lanka - kawda raja, polowehi wali men, la hiru paya - ganga, madhu samaye malsame, aadara loke mage - aadareyi man aadareyi, sihinen awidin, werale hapila - nila, ma eda dasin sanaha - hithuwoth hithuwamayi, muhuda gala ee nam, denuwan bingun - pembara madhu, bambaarindu ronsunu lol - wishmaya, rangamandale lokaya me, sangitha rawe chanchala melowe - sali, kalak awamen perum pura, sanda thaniwela ahase - apeksha, sewane kumbauk sewane - monarathanna, sansaraye pathuwa se - raja dawasak, aashawe sithum makila - githika, sasthare sasthare katado - mihidum sihina, senehasa pawa yali hamuwuwa, sihina ahase wasanthe - nawatha hamuwemu, didi hadu di - bambaara patikki.
yawathkalina karana lada lumiya dinim jangama durakathanayada niyama margaye pawathiyi.
rate nayakathwaya pasupasin aanandayen maradanata giya samajaya aanandayen nomads pitiyata gena yannata janadhipathithuma uthsaha kala yuthu ya.
